summary: BLUE STATE is a romantic comedy about a disgruntled Democrat who actually follows through on a drunken campaign promise to move to Canada if George "Dubya" Bush gets re-elected.
cast: Breckin Meyer|Anna Paquin|Joyce Krenz|Richard Blackburn|Adriana O'Neil|Seun Olagunju|Bryan Terrell Clark|Nicolas Ouellette|Tim Henry|James Juce|Elicia Cronin|Judy Cook|Scott Pangman|Kristjan Harris|Leigh Enns|Sean O'Brian|Grace Lynn Kung|David Stuart Evans|Erik Fjeldsted|Darcy Fehr|Francis Fontaine|Brent Neale|Edward Sutton|Daina Leitold|Lois Brothers|Susanna Portnoy|Mike Bell|George W. Bush|Cory Cassidy|John Kerry|Michael Larocque|Lorrie Papadopoulos|Ash Sroka
keywords: election|reference to baghdad iraq|reference to the strawberry statement|dead son|dead brother
title: Destino Canadá
